skill.name: daily-ai-news
skill.description: Aggregates and summarizes the latest AI news from multiple sources including AI news websites and web search. Provides concise news briefs with direct links to original articles. Activates when user asks for 'today's AI news', 'AI updates', 'latest AI developments', or mentions wanting a 'daily AI briefing'.
skill.summary: Aggregates and summarizes the latest AI news from multiple sources including AI news websites and we...
skill.author: YYH211

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing instructions for AI news aggregation. No executable code, network calls, or file operations are present. The skill provides structured workflows and templates for gathering AI news using external tools like web readers and search engines.

content.value_statement: Stay updated with the latest AI developments without spending hours browsing multiple sources. This skill aggregates and summarizes AI news from top publications, delivering concise briefings with direct links to original articles.
actual_capabilities: Aggregates AI news from 20+ trusted sources including TechCrunch, VentureBeat, and MIT Technology Review
Categorizes news into 5 sections: Major Announcements, Research, Industry, Tools, and Policy
Provides concise summaries with key points and impact analysis
Includes direct links to original articles for full details
Supports multiple output formats: standard, brief, deep analysis, chronological, and by company
Filters content by date range with automatic deduplication
limitations: Requires active internet connection to fetch real-time news
Dependent on external news sources being accessible
News availability may vary by geographic region
Cannot access paywalled content beyond available excerpts

use_cases.title: Track Latest Research Breakthroughs
use_cases.description: Stay informed about new papers, models, and technical advances in AI with categorized research summaries.

use_cases.title: Monitor AI Business Developments
use_cases.description: Follow funding rounds, acquisitions, product launches, and partnerships in the AI industry.

use_cases.title: Get Daily AI Updates
use_cases.description: Receive easy-to-digest summaries of the most important AI news delivered in a structured format.

prompt_templates.title: Daily Briefing
prompt_templates.scenario: Quick morning update on AI news
prompt_templates.prompt: Give me today's AI news briefing with the most important developments from the last 24 hours.

prompt_templates.title: Research Focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the latest AI research papers and breakthroughs from this week, including key findings and implications.

prompt_templates.title: Industry News
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the latest AI industry developments including funding, acquisitions, and major company announcements?

prompt_templates.title: Deep Dive
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide an in-depth analysis of today's most significant AI announcement including expert reactions and market implications.

output: **Summary**: OpenAI announced GPT-4.5 Turbo with 2x faster inference and 50% cost reduction
- New model achieves 95% accuracy on MMLU benchmark
**Impact**: This significantly reduces costs for AI applications while improving performance
ðŸ“… Source: OpenAI Blog â€¢ January 5, 2025
**Summary**: Revolutionary protein structure prediction model now predicts DNA and RNA structures
- Extends beyond proteins to all biological molecules
**Impact**: Accelerates drug discovery and biological research worldwide

best_practices: Specify your preferred focus area (research, industry, tools) for more relevant results
Request brief format for quick headlines or deep format for detailed analysis
Ask follow-up questions about specific stories that interest you
Set up regular briefings by asking for daily or weekly updates
anti_patterns: Don't ask for news without specifying a timeframe - use 'today', 'this week', or specific dates
Avoid vague requests like 'tell me about AI' - be specific about news vs tutorials vs opinions
Don't expect real-time breaking news - there's a short delay for aggregation and summarization

faq.question: Which AI tools is this skill compatible with?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It uses standard web search and reading capabilities available in these platforms.

faq.question: How many news sources does it check?
faq.answer: The skill checks 20+ sources including major tech publications, company blogs, and research databases, updating daily.

faq.question: Can I get news in other languages?
faq.answer: Currently optimized for English sources, but can find and summarize news from international publications when available.

faq.question: Is my search history or data saved?
faq.answer: No, the skill operates statelessly. Your queries and preferences are not stored or tracked between sessions.

faq.question: What if a news source is paywalled?
faq.answer: The skill uses available excerpts and summaries. Paywalled content is noted with a warning about limited access.

faq.question: How does this compare to Google News or RSS feeds?
faq.answer: This provides curated, categorized summaries with analysis and context, not just headlines. It's specifically focused on AI news with expert curation.
